name: Missile Defender (SMH Studios)
description:
Missile Defender.  Important note: Playing on the web have some graphics limitations. To play on the best conditions, download the game.

Made for the Weekly Game Jame 150.

Theme: You're the Enemy.

You control a missile and your objective is to defende the enemy by destroying the players or taking the medical kits to heal it and last the longest.

Controls:

  • W and S  /  up and down arrows  to go up or down.
  • A and D  /  left and right arrows  to rotate.
  • SPACE to accelerate.
